original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naupādinnupādāniyo

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, sahajāte cha …pe… avigate cha.

analyzed: ▁sa nidassan a sappaṭigh o ▁a nupādinnupādāniy o ▁dhammo ▁nasanidassanas a ppaṭi gh assa ▁na a nupādinnupādāniy assa

original: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe nava, anantare tīṇi …pe…

analyzed: ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁an upādinn a an upādān iyaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na an idassanaappaṭigh o

original: naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā
